jannie.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • jannie.shapes.Shape
      • jannie.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape
    A class that represents any regular polygon with a specified number of sides and side length
    Version:
    10/15/17
    Author:
    janniezhong

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class jannie.shapes.Shape

        x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Creates a RegularPolygon with the default settings: 3 sides, a sideLength of 100 pixels, strokeWeight 1, fillColor and strokeColor black (and is filled), located with the center at (200, 200)
      RegularPolygon(int numSides, double sideLength, double x1, double y1, int strokeWeight, java.awt.Color c, boolean fill, java.awt.Color s, boolean stroke)
      Creates a RegularPolygon with the specified number of sides, sideLength, strokeWeight, fillColor, strokeColor, located with the center at (x1, y1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Creates a RegularPolygon with the default settings: 3 sides, a sideLength of 100 pixels, strokeWeight 1, fillColor and strokeColor black (and is filled), located with the center at (200, 200)

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(int numSides,
                      double sideLength,
                      double x1,
                      double y1,
                      int strokeWeight,
                      java.awt.Color c,
                      boolean fill,
                      java.awt.Color s,
                      boolean stroke)
        Creates a RegularPolygon with the specified number of sides, sideLength, strokeWeight, fillColor, strokeColor, located with the center at (x1, y1)
        Parameters:
        numSides - number of sides this RegularPolygon has
        sideLength - the side length of one of the sides
        x1 - the x-coordinate of the center of this RegularPolygon
        y1 - the y-coordinate of the center of this RegularPolygon
        strokeWeight - the strokeWeight of this RegularPolygon
        c - the fill color of this RegularPolygon
        fill - whether this RegularPolygon should be filled in or not
        s - the stroke color of this RegularPolygon
        stroke - whether this RegularPolygon should have a stroke or not
